title: The Injection Song (with Felicia Folkes)
itunes:title: The Injection Song (with Felicia Folkes)
description:
Did the C.I.A inject cancer into Bob Marley? Langston and David poke around with guest Felicia Folkes (Comedy Central) about the injection theory and more around what really happened to the iconic singer.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
